.page-login-v3 .panel { margin: 100px auto; width: 400px; /* margin-top: 20%; */ /* margin-bottom: 45px; */ background: #fff; display: block; /* border-radius: 0.286rem; */ }
.page-login-v3 .panel .panel-body { padding: 50px 40px 40px; }
.page-login-v3 .panel .brand-text { margin-top: 8px; }
.page-login-v3 form { margin: 45px 0 30px; }
.page-login-v3 form a { margin-left: 20px; }
.page-login-v3 form .form-material.floating+.page-login-v3 form .form-material.floating { margin-top: 30px; }
.page-login-v3 form .form-material label { color: #a3afb7; font-weight: 300; }
.page-login-v3 .checkbox-custom { margin-top: 0;
}
.page-login-v3 .brand { /* position: absolute; */ margin: 0 auto; margin-top: -120px; width: 130px; height: 130px; background: #29314e url(https://i.imgur.com/c6RCSav.png) no-repeat center; -webkit-background-size: contain; -moz-background-size: contain; -o-background-size: contain; background-size: contain; border: solid 10px #29314e; }
/* .page-login-v3 .brand img{ background: #a3afb7; padding: 6px;
background: url(https://i.imgur.com/Tbs7dye.png) no-repeat;
} */
@media (max-width: 479.98px) { .page-login-v3 .page-content { padding: 30px 20px; } .page-login-v3 .panel { width: auto; padding: 10px; } .page-login-v3 .panel .panel-body { padding: 35px 25px 35px; } } .profile-block .card-block { padding: 40px 15px; /* background-color: #fff; */ }
.profile-block .card-footer { padding: 10px; background-color: #f6f9fd; border-top: none; }
.profile-block .card .avatar { width: 120px; margin-bottom: 10px; }
.profile-block .profile-user { margin-bottom: 10px; color: #263238; }
.profile-block .profile-job { margin-bottom: 20px; color: #a3afb7; }
.profile-block .profile-social { margin: 25px 0; }
.profile-block .profile-social .icon { margin: 0 10px; color: rgba(55, 71, 79, 0.4); }
.profile-block .profile-stat-count { display: block; margin-bottom: 3px; color: #526069; font-size: 20px; font-weight: 100; }
.profile-block .profile-stat-count+span { color: #a3afb7; }
.profile-block .page-content .list-group-item { padding: 25px 15px; border-top-color: #e4eaec; }
.profile-block .page-content .list-group-item:first-child { border-top: transparent; }
.profile-block .page-content .list-group-item:last-child { border-bottom-color: #e4eaec; }
.profile-block .page-content .list-group-item .media .avatar { width: 50px; }
.profile-block .page-content .list-group-item .media small { color: #a3afb7; }
.profile-block .page-content .list-group-item .media-heading { font-size: 16px; }
.profile-block .page-content .list-group-item .media-heading span { margin-left: 5px; color: #76838f; font-size: 1rem; }
.profile-block .page-content .list-group-item .media .media:first-child { border-top: none; }
.profile-block .profile-readMore { margin: 40px 0; }
.profile-block .profile-brief { margin-top: 20px; }
.profile-block .profile-uploaded { float: left; max-width: 220px; width: 100%; max-height: 150px; padding: 0 20px 20px 0; }
.profile-block .panel-actions-keep{ top: 8%; }
.page-fb-wall .imgs-gallery { margin: -2px; }
.page-fb-wall .imgs-gallery .gallery-item { display: block; border: 2px solid transparent; }
.wall-attrs { list-style: none; }
.wall-attrs .success { color: #11c26d; }
.wall-attrs .attrs-meta { line-height: 30px; }
.wall-attrs i { margin-right: 2px; }
.wall-attrs .avatar { margin-left: 2px; }
.wall-comment { position: relative; margin-bottom: 15px; }
.wall-comment .comment-operation { position: absolute; right: 0; top: -10px; }
.wall-comment-reply .reply-operation { display: none; }
.wall-comment-reply .reply-operation.active { display: block; margin-top: 15px; }
.wall-person-info { position: relative; padding-left: 190px; padding-bottom: 45px; }
.wall-person-info .person-avatar { position: absolute; top: -75px; left: 30px; width: 140px; height: 140px; }
.wall-person-info .person-name { position: absolute; top: -55px; left: 190px; margin: 0; }
.wall-person-info .person-name a { color: #fff; }
.wall-person-info .person-name a:hover, .wall-person-info .person-name a:focus { text-decoration: none; }
.wall-posting .form-control { border: none; border-bottom: 1px solid #e4eaec; border-radius: 0; }
.wall-recent-comments .comments-view { border-top: 1px solid #e4eaec; padding: 10px 0; text-align: center; }
@media (min-width: 1200px) { .page-fb-wall .card-img-top { height: 350px; } }
@media (max-width: 479.98px) { .wall-person-info .person-name { font-size: 24px; } } /* Make clicks pass-through */ #nprogress { pointer-events: none; }
#nprogress .bar { background: #fff; position: fixed; z-index: 9999; top: 0px; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 4px; }
/* Fancy blur effect */ #nprogress .peg { display: none; position: absolute; right: 0px; width: 100px; height: 100%; box-shadow: 0 0 10px #fff, 0 0 5px #fff; opacity: 1.0;
-webkit-transform: rotate(3deg) translate(0px, -4px); -ms-transform: rotate(3deg) translate(0px, -4px); transform: rotate(3deg) translate(0px, -4px); }
/* Remove these to get rid of the spinner */ #nprogress .spinner { display: none; position: fixed; z-index: 1031; top: 15px; right: 15px; }
#nprogress .spinner-icon { width: 18px; height: 18px; box-sizing: border-box;
border: solid 2px transparent; border-top-color: #fff; border-left-color: #fff; border-radius: 50%;
-webkit-animation: nprogress-spinner 400ms linear infinite; animation: nprogress-spinner 400ms linear infinite; }
.nprogress-custom-parent { overflow: hidden; position: relative; }
.nprogress-custom-parent #nprogress .spinner, .nprogress-custom-parent #nprogress .bar { position: absolute; }
@-webkit-keyframes nprogress-spinner { 0% { -webkit-transform: rotate(0deg); } 100% { -webkit-transform: rotate(360deg); } } @keyframes nprogress-spinner { 0% { transform: rotate(0deg); } 100% { transform: rotate(360deg); } } .vb > .vb-dragger { z-index: 5; width: 10px; right: 0; }
.vb > .vb-dragger > .vb-dragger-styler { -webkit-backface-visibility: hidden; backface-visibility: hidden; -webkit-transform: rotate3d(0,0,0,0); transform: rotate3d(0,0,0,0); -webkit-transition: background-color 300ms ease-out, margin 300ms ease-out, height 300ms ease-out; transition: background-color 300ms ease-out, margin 300ms ease-out, height 300ms ease-out; background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0,0); /* margin: 5px 5px 5px 0; */ margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; border-radius: 2px; height: calc(100% - 10px); display: block; user-input: disabled; user-focus: ignore; }
.vb.vb-scrolling-phantom > .vb-dragger > .vb-dragger-styler { background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0,.3); }
.vb > .vb-dragger:hover > .vb-dragger-styler { background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0,.5); margin: 0px; height: 100%; border-radius: 4px }
.vb.vb-dragging > .vb-dragger > .vb-dragger-styler { background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0,.5); margin: 0px; height: 100%; }
.vb.vb-dragging-phantom > .vb-dragger > .vb-dragger-styler { background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0,.5); } /* * Social Buttons for Bootstrap * * Copyright 2013-2016 Panayiotis Lipiridis * Licensed under the MIT License * * https://github.com/lipis/bootstrap-social */
